description:
This bug is opened as fix released for https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1185290 is reverted back in v2.1.

Fix proposed in v3 was reverted/commented out in v2.1 to make v2.1 fully compatible and identical with v2. - https://review.openstack.org/#/c/145687/

We need to fix this for both v2 and v2.1 APIs.
title: nova list's --tenant filter does not return expected servers

comments.content:
This bug is opened as fix released for https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1185290 is reverted back in v2.1.

Fix proposed in v3 was reverted/commented out in v2.1 to make v2.1 fully compatible and identical with v2. - https://review.openstack.org/#/c/145687/

We need to fix this for both v2 and v2.1 APIs.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content: Tempest tests needs to be modified.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/195412
Reason: This patch has been stalled for quite a while, so I am going to abandon it to keep the code review queue sane. Please restore the change when it is ready for review.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Change abandoned by John Garbutt (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/198184
Reason: It seems this spec has been abandoned for Mitaka :(
Dropping this from the review queue for now.
Please do restore if that is not the case, and raise it in the API meeting.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Ghanshyam Mann (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/195869
Reason: Need to check later.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
So we could add a microversion to enable --tenant id to work without needing --all-tenants to also be set. Seems sensible.

This bug really needs a little spec to describe changes to the input scheme changes, etc.

Still seems worth fixing.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt

comments.content: Unassigning this bug as there is no activity from last 6 months. If you are still want to work on this bug, feel free to assign yourself.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~chkumar246
